AdditionalFields.Value: Molecular/Cellular Biology and Genetics,Radiation Science and Medicine,Clinical Research,Immunology

Description: To date, trials in solid tumor cell therapy have established the initial safety, limited successes, and hurdles to overcome. With increasing knowledge of solid tumor immunology, advances in genetic engineering that lead to improved design of CAR, TCR, and manufacturing lessons learned from hematological malignancy cell therapies, the next phase in solid tumor cell therapy has been evolving. In this session, we will discuss the recent advances and upcoming trials in solid tumor cell therapies -by use of TILs, TCRs, and CARs.
Location: Ballroom 20 CD - Upper Level - Convention Center

Title: Cell Therapies for Solid Tumors
